text: Living Right or Livin' Right can refer to: *Livin' Right (album), the debut album by Steve Forde and the Flange *"Livin' Right", a song by Glenn Frey *"Living Right", a song by Lil Wayne featuring Wiz Khalifa, on Lil Wayne's album Free Weezy Album ==See also== *Right to an adequate standard of living
title: Living Right
